skillTree.name: Skeletal Steed
skillTree.description: Enables the Skeletal Steed (Mount)

skillTree.name: Rightful Rulers
skillTree.description: The world lies in disarray, ripe with strife, tainted by foul magics, depraved religions and loathsome deities that offend our gods. WeÂ´ll not stop until we crush all those false kings and bring order and civilization to all lands.

effects.description:
Magic Resistance: 3% for Construct units
	(Lord's army)

Magic Resistance: 6% for Construct units
	(Lord's army)

Magic Resistance: 10% for Construct units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Teachings of Tahoth
skillTree.description: A Liche High Priest has performed hundreds of thousands of rituals in life and in undeath, the magics needed to keep an entire army marching and fighting forever being like a second nature to them.

skillTree.name: Embalmed in Elixir
skillTree.description: The fluid used to embalm the Tomb King toughens his bindings, enabling him to withstand a greater degree of damage than would otherwise be possible.

skillTree.name: Ceremonial Bandages
skillTree.description: Soaked in and toughened by embalming fluid, the cloth bindings used to mummify afford the wearer additional protection from all but a direct hit from mortal projectiles.

skillTree.name: Mentor
skillTree.description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +20%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +35%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +50%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Ptra the Great Father
skillTree.description: Symbolising immortality and eternity, the ruler of the Nehekharan Pantheon has always had a care for the wellbeing of his children.

effects.description:
Hero recruit rank: +2 for Tomb Princes
	(factionwide)

Leadership: +4 for Tomb Guard and Chariot units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +8 for Tomb Guard and Chariot units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Geheb the God of Earth
skillTree.description: "They stand staring into the sun for eternity, the physical embodiment of the everlasting gods. Terrible ye who looked into their divine forms!"

effects.description:
Attrition: -25% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

Recruit rank: +1 for Ushabti units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +5 for Ushabti and Ushabti (Great Bow) units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +5 for Ushabti and Ushabti (Great Bow) units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Usirian the God of the Underworld
skillTree.description: Those who oppose the faceless God of the Underworld shall suffer terribly, condemned to its lowest levels for eternity.

effects.description:
Missile strength: +10% for Casket of Souls units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Asaph the Goddess of Magic & Vengeance
skillTree.description: They who serve the Asp Goddess are blessed with a precise aim with which to reach their objectives.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve change: +15% when increasing

Missile strength: +8% for Skeleton Archers, and Sepulchral Stalkers units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Djaf's Incantation of Cursed Blades
skillTree.description: Imbued with the essence of the God of Death, the Nehekharans' blades strike with supernatural force to harvest souls for Djaf.

effects.description: Overcast spell: "Djaf's Incantation of Cursed Blades Upgraded"
Cooldown: -50% to "Djaf's Incantation of Cursed Blades"
Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Djaf's Incantation of Cursed Blades"
Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Djaf's Incantation of Cursed Blades Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Djaf's Incantation of Cursed Blades Upgraded"

skillTree.name: The Restless Dead
skillTree.description: By which the dead don't stay that way for long, springing back into jerking, clanking Unlife.

ui_effects.description: Greatly replenishes hit points of combatants

skillTree.name: Neru's Incantation of Protection
skillTree.description: Sword-blows are mysteriously turned away as Ptra's wife reaches out to shield Nehekhara's warriors from evil.

effects.description: Overcast spell: "Neru's Incantation of Protection Upgraded"
Overcast spell: "Neru's Incantation of Protection Upgraded"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Neru's Incantation of Protection"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Neru's Incantation of Protection Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Neru's Incantation of Protection Upgraded"

skillTree.name: Ptra's Incantation of Righteous Smiting
skillTree.description: When the verses are spoken, a fierce light emanates from the Undead's empty eye-sockets, enabling them to strike with supernatural speed and fury.

effects.description: Overcast spell: "Ptra's Incantation of Righteous Smiting Upgraded"
Cooldown: -30% to "Ptra's Incantation of Righteous Smiting"
Overcast spell: "Ptra's Incantation of Righteous Smiting Upgraded"
Cooldown: -50% to "Ptra's Incantation of Righteous Smiting"

Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Ptra's Incantation of Righteous Smiting Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Ptra's Incantation of Righteous Smiting Upgraded"

skillTree.name: Usirian's Incantation of Vengeance
skillTree.description: As the names of Usirian are invoked, skeletal hands burst forth from beneath the sand to drag the foe to their graves.

ui_effects.description: Strong vs 25 men unit or above

effects.description: Overcast spell: "Usirian's Incantation of Vengeance Upgraded"
Overcast spell: "Usirian's Incantation of Vengeance Upgraded"

ui_effects.description: Strong vs 25 men unit or above

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Usirian's Incantation of Vengeance"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Usirian's Incantation of Vengeance Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Usirian's Incantation of Vengeance Upgraded"

skillTree.name: Usekhp's Incantation of Desiccation
skillTree.description: Every syllable strips moisture and saps vitality from the bodies of Usekhp's unfortunate victims.

effects.description: Overcast spell: "Usekhp's Incantation of Desiccation Upgraded"
Overcast spell: "Usekhp's Incantation of Desiccation Upgraded"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Usekhp's Incantation of Desiccation"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Usekhp's Incantation of Desiccation Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Usekhp's Incantation of Desiccation Upgraded"

skillTree.name: Sakhmet's Incantation of the Skullstorm
skillTree.description: A whirlwind of skulls tears across the battlefield, devouring all in its path in the Goddess of the Green Moon's bitter, vindictive name.

effects.description: Overcast spell: "Sakhmet's Incantation of the Skullstorm Upgraded"
Cooldown: -30% to "Sakhmet's Incantation of the Skullstorm"
Overcast spell: "Sakhmet's Incantation of the Skullstorm Upgraded"
Cooldown: -50% to "Sakhmet's Incantation of the Skullstorm"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Sakhmet's Incantation of the Skullstorm"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Sakhmet's Incantation of the Skullstorm Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Sakhmet's Incantation of the Skullstorm Upgraded"

skillTree.name: Earthing
skillTree.description: By stabbing a staff or some arcane conduit into the ground, an accomplished magic-user can earth or tether the Winds and hopefully reduce a chance of miscasting.

skillTree.name: Magical Reserves
skillTree.description: A few magic-users have the ability to store the Winds of Magic for later use, increasing their spellcasting power when it really counts.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +5

skillTree.name: Martial Mastery (Skill Dump)
skillTree.description: When everything else fails, there is always studying the blade. (This skill can accept up to 20 Skill Points)

skillTree.name: Defensive Dedication (Skill Dump)
skillTree.description: Wielding the shield is better than returning on it. (This skill can accept up to 20 Skill Points)

skillTree.name: Indomitable Will
skillTree.description: It is not possible to defeat such unshakeable spirit once its owner's mind is made up.

skillTree.name: Conqueror
skillTree.description: Kill many and you *are* a conqueror; godhood is then but a protracted slaughter away...

skillTree.name: Blade Master
skillTree.description: This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.

skillTree.name: Hard to Hit
skillTree.description: Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, itâs not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.

skillTree.name: Indomitable
skillTree.description: The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.

skillTree.name: Tombstrike
skillTree.description: He whose will transcends death can strike out from beyond the grave, to devastating effect.

skillTree.name: Wound-Maker
skillTree.description: Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.

skillTree.name: Full Plate Armour
skillTree.description: Full-Plate armour protects the wearer from head-to-foot. Many such suits are blessed or imbued with arcane abilities.

skillTree.name: Devastating Charge
skillTree.description: Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.

skillTree.name: Over My Dead Body
skillTree.description: Death is not an impedance to the strongest of wills.

skillTree.name: Desertstrike
skillTree.description: Beware the scorpion's sting, hidden 'neath the desert sands yet always poised to strike.

skillTree.name: The Gods Demand It!
skillTree.description: Ignorants and fools believe even our lands belong to them, but the gods gave them to us for all eternity. Let none escape their holy wrath!

skillTree.name: Arrows of Asaph
skillTree.description: Carrying the blessing of the goddess Asaph, these arrows seek out the foe with unerring accuracy.

effects.description:
Ammunition: +8% for Skeleton Archers, Screaming Skull Catapult and Bone Giant units

skillTree.name: The Eye of Djaf
skillTree.description: The god of War and Death watches over our warriors and gives their weapons the power to lay low any foe.

	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Punishment of Phatkh
skillTree.description: The god of the Sky sees everything and will send his servants to deliver swift justice upon grave robbers and invaders alike.

Charge Bonus: +5 for melee Cavalry and melee Chariot units (Excluding Sepulchral Stalker and Necropolis Knight units)

skillTree.name: Guided by Khsar
skillTree.description: When the interlopers try to cross the sands, the god of the Desert will awake its defenders to surround and hunt them without mercy.

effects.description:
Speed: +4% for ranged Cavalry and all Chariot units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Eternal Wardens
skillTree.description: Neru, goddess of Protection, preserves the borders of Nehekhara with a legion of animated monuments.

skillTree.name: The Might of Geheb
skillTree.description: The god of Earth infuses the most magnificent of constructs with strength and hardness. Often, this is enough to level walled fortresses to the ground and withstand otherwise fatal onslaughts.

effects.description:
Armour: +4 for Scorpion, Sphynx, Bone Giant and Hierotitan units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Reanimate
skillTree.description: It takes an iron will and unnatural - supernatural - strength to rally bound troops routed by magical means.

skillTree.name: Blessing of the Asp
skillTree.description: Arrows loosed under the ever-watchful eye of the Serpent Goddess find their marks with divine precision.

effects.description:
Ammunition: +15% for Skeleton Archers, Ushabti (Great Bow), Skeleton Horsemen Archers, Screaming Skull Catapult and Bone Giant units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +8% for Skeleton Archers, Ushabti (Great Bow), Skeleton Horsemen Archers, Screaming Skull Catapult and Bone Giant units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Missile resistance: 15% for Skeleton Archers, Ushabti (Great Bow), Skeleton Horsemen Archers, Screaming Skull Catapult and Bone Giant units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Dune Rider
skillTree.description: The desert itself is his steed.

effects.description:
Armour: +10 for Nehekhara Horsemen, Skeleton Horsemen, Sepulchral Stalkers, Necropolis Knights, Skeleton Chariot and Skeleton Archer Chariot units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +5 for Nehekhara Horsemen, Skeleton Horsemen, Sepulchral Stalkers, Necropolis Knights, Skeleton Chariot and Skeleton Archer Chariot units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Physical resistance: 10% for Nehekhara Horsemen, Skeleton Horsemen, Sepulchral Stalkers, Necropolis Knights, Skeleton Chariot and Skeleton Archer Chariot units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Unfading Memory
skillTree.description: A dream of glory attained through conquest great rages still, despite the dying of the light.

effects.description:
Armour: +10 for Nehekhara Warriors, Tomb Guards, Skeleton Warriors and Spearmen units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Speed: +10% for Nehekhara Warriors, Skeleton Warriors, Skeleton Spearmen and Tomb Guard units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Missile resistance: 15% for Nehekhara Warriors, Skeleton Warriors, Skeleton Spearmen and Tomb Guard units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Ancient Stone
skillTree.description: The very strength of the desert, to stand sentinel over the Tomb Kings' domain and crush their enemies to dust.

effects.description:
Leadership: +5 for Ushabti, Tomb Scorpion, Hierotitan, Necrosphinx and Khemrian Warsphinx units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +8% for Ushabti, Tomb Scorpion, Hierotitan, Necrosphinx and Khemrian Warsphinx units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Spell resistance: 15% for Ushabti, Tomb Scorpion, Hierotitan, Necrosphinx and Khemrian Warsphinx units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Resurrect
skillTree.description: Dark litanies are uttered to restore the Tomb Kings' slain soldiers to a twisted, chattering imitation of life.

skillTree.name: Route Marcher
skillTree.description: Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.

skillTree.name: Iron Disciplinarian
skillTree.description: This Lord expects utter obedience from the smallfolk, and has little time for insurrections or petty revolts.

skillTree.name: Sand Sweeper
skillTree.description: Some of war's spoils are more difficult to see but are just as valuable as gold or jewels.

skillTree.name: Soul Reaper
skillTree.description: This one scours the battlefields, plains and dunes for the vanquished dead, so that his armies may march at full strength once more.

skillTree.name: Canopic Jar Hoarder
skillTree.description: These jars contain the remains of many Liche Priests, which are useful for raising and binding a new force.

skillTree.name: Attend Me!
skillTree.description: Nehekhara's mummified rulers are awake, their eyes burning with balefire, their thirst for power, conquest and vengeance every bit as strong as they were in life.

skillTree.name: Lightning Strike
skillTree.description: "The time to strike is now!"

effects.description: Enables lightning strike battles when reinforcements are present

skillTree.name: Imperishable
skillTree.description: By which the Undead armies of Nehekhara may remain deathless, undying and forever hungry for slaughter.

effects.description:
Attrition: -15% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

Attrition: -25% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

Attrition: -35% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: All is Mine!
skillTree.description: To the victor, the spoils. All of them. Always.

skillTree.name: The Dead Sand Sentinel
skillTree.description: It stands watch over the land, lest the foe's insidious, opportunistic agents dare to strike.

skillTree.name: Renowned & Feared
skillTree.description: Renowned among their allies and feared by enemies both mortal and otherwise, this Lord's every deed adds to their already legendary reputation.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +25% chance of wounding aggressors

backgroundSkills.name: Immortality
backgroundSkills.description: Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say noâ¦

effects.description: This Lord will be wounded instead of killed in battle

backgroundSkills.name: Aggressive
backgroundSkills.description: If you're gonna die, you may as well die with your boots on.

backgroundSkills.name: Master of Ceremony
backgroundSkills.description: "Revered One, Venerable One, Lord of Secrets, High Priest of the Temple of Yearsâ¦"

backgroundSkills.name: Trustworthy
backgroundSkills.description: The people of the desert live and die by their oaths in Basth's graceful sight.

backgroundSkills.name: Treacherous
backgroundSkills.description: The God of the Scorpions protects the venal, the perfidious, and the downright murderous.

effects.description:
Hero action success chance: +5%
	(Heroes in local province)

Melee attack: +5 for Tomb Scorpion units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +5 for Tomb Scorpion units
	(Lord's army)

backgroundSkills.name: Wrathful
backgroundSkills.description: The Tomb Kings and their servants feel Khsar's wrath coursing through their Unliving veins.

backgroundSkills.name: Prepared
backgroundSkills.description: Unlife is forever; it is therefore prudent to go willingly and prepared.

backgroundSkills.name: Eternal
backgroundSkills.description: Time itself cannot harm those who have defied death.

backgroundSkills.name: Fleet-Footed
backgroundSkills.description: Being fleet of foot is useful in a fightâ¦ or when trying to get away afterwards!

backgroundSkills.name: Scavenger
backgroundSkills.description: The Vulture-God assists the desert poozler, lest they lose their way 'neath the scorching desert sun.

effects.description: Post battle chance of stealing a magic item: +20%

backgroundSkills.name: Cunning
backgroundSkills.description: Deceit is a perfectly acceptable means of attack.

effects.description:
Ambush success chance: +10%
	(armies in local owned region)

backgroundSkills.name: Disciplined
backgroundSkills.description: Always in control, this one leaves no stone unturned and nothing to chance.

backgroundSkills.name: Strategist
backgroundSkills.description: This being has a plan - not just a game plan, but a master plan to achieve their long-term aims.

backgroundSkills.name: Tactician
backgroundSkills.description: Careful planning, knowledge of the terrain and the weaknesses of the enemy are the key to victory.

backgroundSkills.name: Tough
backgroundSkills.description: Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.
